title: Love and Hate
description: ****Re-edited version!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!****Claudia wants excitement, passion, and freedom.Donovan doesn't know what he wants, but he does know that something is missing from his lifeâ€¦.. Something that can give him a purpose.One fateful night will reveal solutions for these two souls.As young love ignites, tragedy hits, and soon these two lovers will learn that because one father is the head of a notorious organized crime family and the other is an Assistant United States attorney, they can never be together.How can you hate someone you're in love with?*This is a debut novel.*Recommended for 17+ due to language, underage drinking, drug use, some violence, and some sexual content.*It is the first of a trilogy, but is also a stand-alone novel.
author: Chelsea Ballinger
